description:
Outline application for redevelopment to provide up to 33,000 square metres containing up to 5,000sq.m. retail/car showroom use at ground level with education and education related uses on remainder of ground and upper floors. 

 Indicative drawings.  78SK-01/Rev.B; 78SK-02/Rev.C;03/ Rev.C;04/Rev.C;06/Rev.C, and agent's letter dated 25th November 1999.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun on or before whichever is the later of the following dates:- 

 1) 5 years from the date of this permission; 2) 2 years from the final approval of details reserved by this outline permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 92(2) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
